name: SHR ContraceptiveNotUsedReasonCS CodeSystem
title: SHR ContraceptiveNotUsedReasonCS CodeSystem
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

concept.display: Newly sexually active, has not yet sought birth control.
concept.definition: Newly sexually active, has not yet sought birth control.

concept.display: Seeking to become pregnant or accepting of the prospect of pregnancy.
concept.definition: Seeking to become pregnant or accepting of the prospect of pregnancy.

concept.display: Either partner is sterile (other than being sterilized for contraceptive purposes, which counts as a method of contraception).
concept.definition: Either partner is sterile (other than being sterilized for contraceptive purposes, which counts as a method of contraception).

concept.display: Not at risk of unintended pregnancy, for example, post-menopausal.
concept.definition: Not at risk of unintended pregnancy, for example, post-menopausal.

concept.display: Declines to use any method of birth control.
concept.definition: Declines to use any method of birth control.

concept.display: Difficulty obtaining contraceptive, for reasons of cost or access.
concept.definition: Difficulty obtaining contraceptive, for reasons of cost or access.
